basic_info.name: Why to Join BVC Institute of Technology & Science?

Section.name: About BVCITS
Section.description:
Established in 1997, by a visionary from an agricultural background, BVC Institute of Technology and Science has accommodated itself amongst the topmost institutions of Andhra Pradesh, offering courses in various disciplines such as B. Tech and MBA. The highly structured administration has contributed in giving directions to the organization at every level of the hierarchy.
Governed By
Bonam Venkata Chalamaya Education Society
Accreditations
AA by Career 360, National Magazine, NBA, NAAC
Approval
AICTE, Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada
Hostel
Accommodation of 90 boys and 150 girls in separate hostels

How to Reach
Nearest Bus Station: AmalapuramÂ (03 km)
Neasest Railway Station: Rajahmundry (65 km)
Nearest Airport : Rajahmundry (65 km)
